long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The CrikZle extension can be used to view live ongoing cricket matches details.

You’ve probably run into this problem – you want to view the cricket match score, but you have to open another tab and go to another website to view the score. 

CrikZle comes handy in this situation! 
Just pin the extension and then, click on the CrikZle logo in your toolbar and it will update you with the live details.

One-click access to live ongoing cricket matches and save time navigating and redirecting to another websites. 

Email at heyadityarajpurohit@gmail.com for support.
